name: Argotlunar
body:
### Introduction
Argotlunar is a real-time delay-line granulator. It breaks up an incoming audio stream into short samples (Grains). Each grain can have random settings of amplitude, panning, duration, delay, pitch, glissando, filter and envelope. The output of all grains is mixed and sent to the main output. The main output can be fed back into the main input.

Time-related parameters can be synced to the host tempo, for rhythmic or pulsing textures. Pitch-related parameters can be quantized for harmonic or melodic effects. Feedback can create chaotic and distorted sounds.

Most of the parameters can be *correlated*. Examples: Higher filter cut-off for grains with higher pitch, and vice versa. Grains with shorter duration can be panned to the center, and conversely the grains with longer duration can be panned wide in the stereo field.

Argotlunar is free software. Licensed under the [GPL v2](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.en.html).

## Download
Current version is 2.06
* Linux VST [64-bit](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3089339/2.0.6/argotlunar-2.06-linux_64.tar.gz) / [32-bit](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3089339/2.0.6/argotlunar-2.06-linux_32.tar.gz)
* OS X 10.8 [AudioUnit](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3089339/2.0.6/argotlunar-2.06-osx_10.8-audiounit.zip) / [VST] (https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3089339/2.0.6/argotlunar-2.06-osx_10.8-vst.zip)
* OS X 10.7 [AudioUnit](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3089339/2.0.6/argotlunar-2.06-osx_10.7-audiounit.zip) / [VST](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3089339/2.0.6/argotlunar-2.06-osx_10.7-vst.zip)
* Windows [64-bit](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3089339/2.0.6/argotlunar-2.06-win_64.zip) / [32-bit](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3089339/2.0.6/argotlunar-2.06-win_32.zip)

### Notes
* Not compatible with Final Cut Pro X
* Linux users should install ttf-bitstream-vera fonts.
* Old versions of Renoise require the setting `Use static processing buffers` enabled in the plugin compatibility options.

### Contact
argotlunar at gmail dot com.
